A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It’s like Rian Johnson doesn’t even understand that this is the 8th movie in an overall story. He completely puts up a middle finger to everything that was established before regarding the rules of the force and how the characters act and he ignores the questions that were asked in VII. The plot is silly and side plot is useless. The way he has Luke portrayed is unforgivable. The movie is visually stunning and has some cool action scenes but that is about all the positives.
